title: Coming Home
description: Mitch Evans left his career as an FBI agent after his father retired as the Baytown Police Chief. Returning home to take up the mantle, he was glad to be back with his family and the Baytown boys. The bonus? Reuniting with his childhood friend and teenage crush.Victoria Bradford came back to Baytown to run the Sea Glass Inn after her grandmother’s death. A simpler life was what she yearned for. When the new Police Chief showed up on her doorstep, her heart skipped a beat as old memories came rushing back.When one of Tori’s guests dies from poisoning, Mitch is determined to stay objective while solving the murder. Then the evidence points to Tori as being the intended victim and another attempt is made on her life.Mitch, desperate to find the killer before he strikes at Tori again, calls upon the Baytown Boys to assist, as he vows to protect her.****Scenes and language similar to what you would find in an R-rated movie - 18+ readers only.****
author: Maryann Jordan
